TopicTitle: Can the stock waypoints be toggled on and off

Articles.Content: What it says on the title. I'd like to keep a few waypoints, just in case I need them/want to visit them in the future, but I don't want to keep seeing them when I'm not interested in them. I've tried Waypoint Manager's option to show only the active ones, but it doesn't work on the stock waypoint markers
I land a probe usually so I can just target it.   helps with runway approach and landing at the best mining location.
